channel.title: Sysdig on Nothing interesting...
channel.description: Recent content in Sysdig on Nothing interesting...

item.title: Debugging slow systems
item.description: Most of this post is blindingly obvious since it’s the scientific method. And quite frankly, I wouldn’t be writing it if someone didn’t ask me why something was slow. Most of the time this is a game of whack-a-mole, especially, if you don’t got something like newrelic installed. A better question to ask is not why is something slow, but when will something become slow? So let’s start with a basic, “OMG, the website is slow!
